title: Human Digit Classification
bullets: Built a computer vision web app with CNNs.

title: Counterfactual Regret Exploration (CFR-Min)
bullets: Exploring CFR-Min for Nash equilibria in imperfect-information games.
Worked examples: Colonel Blotto, Kuhn Poker.
Toward general application for sequential games (Risk, Poker).

title: NLHE Alpha-Beta Pruning
bullets: Adversarial search with alpha‚Äìbeta pruning over game tree.
Hand bucketing + probabilistic range model to reduce space.

title: Linux Shell (C)
bullets: Fully operational shell: commands, piping, I/O redirection, signals.
Custom commands: source, prev, cd, help, verbose toggle.
